my-saas-app.name: My SaaS App
my-saas-app.description: A tool that helps developers do X faster. Built with Next.js, TypeScript, and Supabase.
my-saas-app.problem: Developers spend too much time on repetitive task X, which slows down their workflow.
my-saas-app.solution: An automated tool that handles X in the background, integrating with existing developer workflows.
my-saas-app.mission_statement: Make X effortless so developers can focus on building.
my-saas-app.success_milestone: 100 paying customers within 6 months of launch
my-saas-app.tagline: Stop doing X manually. Let us handle it.
